entries.summary: Massive content expansion day: restructured vocabulary, added 30 new verbs, created new categories, and polished 10 grammar topics.
changes: Restructured vocabulary from 6 broad categories to 13 focused categories

Added 30 new verbs: FICAR, PRECISAR, CHEGAR, ENCONTRAR, LEVAR, TRAZER, DEIXAR, COMECAR, ACABAR, ESPERAR, VOLTAR, LEMBRAR, PERGUNTAR, RESPONDER, PASSAR, ENTRAR, MUDAR, ACONTECER, JOGAR, TOCAR, ESCOLHER, ACREDITAR, EXPLICAR, ENVIAR, RECEBER, PARECER, PEDIR, VIAJAR, PREFERIR, DEVER
Now 71 verbs with 2,130 conjugations across 6 tenses
Added 3 new vocabulary categories: Shopping & Money, Nature & Animals, Emotions & Personality
Added Colloquial & Slang category with 35 everyday EP expressions
Polished 10 grammar topics: ser-vs-estar, articles, noun-gender, negation, questions, prepositions, reflexive-verbs, possessives, demonstratives, present-tense-ar
New feature: What's New page with changelog and dismissable homepage banner
